async calculate_greeks(s0, k, r, sigma, q, T, price, option_side=None, option_type=None, **kwargs)

Calculate greeks function

Parameters:

  • s0 (float) – Initial price

  • k (float) – Strike price

  • r (float) – Risk-free rate

  • sigma (float) – Volatility

  • q (float) – Dividend yield

  • T (float) – Time to maturity

  • price (float) – Price of the option

  • option_side (str) – Side of the option (i.e. call or put)

  • option_type (str) – Type of the option (i.e. european or american)

  • kwargs (dict) – Keyword arguments

Returns:

Results from the API

Return type:

dict

async get_security_cash_flows(security_id, as_of_date=None, price=100.0, lognormal=False, volatility=1.0, drift_a=1.0, yield_shift=100.0, shock_in_bp=0.0, price_as_yield=False, cpr=-9999.0, psa=-9999.0, use_test_data=False, **kwargs)

Parameters:

  • security_id (str) – Security ID

  • as_of_date (str) – Date to get security cash flows for

  • volatility (float) – Volatility

  • drift_a (float) – Mean Reversion

  • yield_shift (float) – Yield shift

async forecast_cf_and_prices(security_id, as_of_date=None, price=100.0, lognormal=False, volatility=1.0, drift_a=1.0, yield_shift=100.0, shock_in_bp=0.0, price_as_yield=False, skip_projections=True, is_spread_shock=False, reindex_frequency=None, cpr=-9999.0, psa=-9999.0, reporting_dates_only=False, post_convert_currency=None, use_reference_curve=False, use_test_data=False, reset_convention=None, alt_security_id=None, inflation_type=None, **kwargs)

Forecast cash flows and prices function

Parameters:

  • security_id (str) – Security ID

  • as_of_date (str) – Date to forecast cash flows and prices for

  • price (float) – Price of the security

  • lognormal (bool) – Lognormal distribution

  • volatility (float) – Volatility

  • drift_a (float) – Mean Reversion

  • yield_shift (float) – Yield shift

  • shock_in_bp (float) – Shock in basis points

  • price_as_yield (bool | str) – Price as yield

  • skip_projections (bool) – Skip projections

  • is_spread_shock (bool) – Spread shock

  • reindex_frequency (int) – Reindex frequency (12 = monthly)

  • cpr (float) – CPR

  • psa (float) – PSA

  • reporting_dates_only (bool) – Reporting dates only

  • post_convert_currency (str) – Post convert currency

  • use_reference_curve (bool) – Use reference curve

  • use_test_data (bool) – Use test data

  • reset_convention (str) – Reset convention

  • alt_security_id (str) – Alternative security ID

  • inflation_type (str) – Inflation type

  • kwargs (dict) – Keyword arguments

Returns:

Results from the API

Return type:

dict
